title: Sugar Kisses
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Wheat-free pastry shop that specializes in gluten free desserts; not everything is gluten free, but everything is labeled. Offers custom-made cakes, and stock its counters with sweet goods such as cupcakes, cookies, brownies; a couple vegan choices. Light lunch and soups daily.
